body.p: Sámi Cultural Centre Sajos Menesjärventie 2 A FI–99870 INARI
Hetta Regional Office Skierri, Peuratie 15 FI-99400 HETTA
Phone center open Mon-Fri at 9-11.00 and 12-15.00.
Sámi Cultural Centre Sajos Sajos | FI–99870 INARI +358 10 839 3168 +358 50 565 1346 sajos(at)samediggi.fi www.sajos.fi
Sajos open Mon-Fri 9.00-17.00 and during events Restaurant Čaiju open Mon-Fri 9.00-15.00

The price for calls from a domestic landline phone to the 010 service numbers is 8.21 cents/call + 5.90 cents/minute. The price for calls from any mobile operator subscription is 8.21 cents/call + 16.90 cents/minute. The price for calls to Saami Parliaments mobilenumbers is the mobile call charge charged by your operator. The prices include value added tax (24 %). When calling from abroad, the price is determined by the local operator.
